meanings.sent1: The classroom was full of happy gigglers during storytime.
meanings.sent2: Children are often natural gigglers when playing with their friends.
meanings.sent3: The group of gigglers made the serious meeting feel lighter and more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter turned everyone into gigglers in no time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gigglers echoed through the park, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.

meanings.sent1: The silly clown was a favorite among the young gigglers at the party.
meanings.sent2: Funny movies are great gigglers for a cozy night in.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected tickle attack was a sneaky little gigglers.
meanings.sent4: Her witty jokes were gigglers that brightened up any dull conversation.
meanings.sent5: The playful puppy was a bundle of gigglers, always making everyone laugh.
